public class ScrollViewLineBorder
extends Border
The LineBorder class draws a 2 pixel wide colored line around the given Rect.

ScrollViewLineBorder()

bottomMargin()
LineBorders have a bottomMargin of 1 pixel.
describeClassInfo(ClassInfo)
Describes the LineBorder class' information.
drawInRect(Graphics, int, int, int, int)
Primitive method for drawing the border in the given Rect.
